snippet.title: DRACULA 4 : THE SHADOW OF THE DRAGON - TRAILER US - MICROÏDS - PC MAC IOS ANDROID
snippet.description:
Join us on Facebook (http://bit.ly/bioA5b) and on Twitter (http://bit.ly/apnV9H) 


Discover the long awaited adventure game Dracula 4 and follow the path of Ellen Cross through the world.

Dracula 4 : The Shadow of the Dragon will be available on PC, Mac, iOS and Android june the 19th 2013.

Follow us :

Facebook : 
http://www.facebook.com/microids and 

http://www.facebook.com/Dracula.series

Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/microids_off
